00057 // ===========================================================================
00058 // method definitions
00059 // ===========================================================================
00060 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::MSLaneSpeedTrigger(const std::string& id,
00061                                        const std::vector<MSLane*> &destLanes,
00062                                        const std::string& file)
00063     : MSTrigger(id), SUMOSAXHandler(file),
00064       myDestLanes(destLanes), myAmOverriding(false), myDidInit(false) {
00065     myCurrentSpeed = destLanes[0]->getMaxSpeed();
00066     if (file != "") {
00067         if (!XMLSubSys::runParser(*this, file)) {
00068             throw ProcessError();
00069         }
00070         if (!myDidInit) {
00071             init();
00072         }
00073     }
00074 }
00075 
00076 void
00077 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::init() {
00078     // set it to the right value
00079     // assert there is at least one
00080     if (myLoadedSpeeds.size() == 0) {
00081         myLoadedSpeeds.push_back(std::make_pair(100000, myCurrentSpeed));
00082     }
00083     // set the process to the begin
00084     myCurrentEntry = myLoadedSpeeds.begin();
00085     // pass previous time steps
00086     while ((*myCurrentEntry).first < MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep() && myCurrentEntry != myLoadedSpeeds.end()) {
00087         processCommand(true, MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep());
00088     }
00089 
00090     // add the processing to the event handler
00091     MSNet::getInstance()->getBeginOfTimestepEvents().addEvent(
00092         new WrappingCommand<MSLaneSpeedTrigger>(this, &MSLaneSpeedTrigger::execute),
00093         (*myCurrentEntry).first, MSEventControl::NO_CHANGE);
00094     myDidInit = true;
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::~MSLaneSpeedTrigger() {}
00099 
00100 
00101 SUMOTime
00102 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::execute(SUMOTime currentTime) {
00103     return processCommand(true, currentTime);
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 SUMOTime
00108 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::processCommand(bool move2next, SUMOTime currentTime) {
00109     UNUSED_PARAMETER(currentTime);
00110     std::vector<MSLane*>::iterator i;
00111     const SUMOReal speed = getCurrentSpeed();
00112     for (i = myDestLanes.begin(); i != myDestLanes.end(); ++i) {
00113 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00114         if (MSGlobals::gUseMesoSim) {
00115             MESegment* first = MSGlobals::gMesoNet->getSegmentForEdge((*i)->getEdge());
00116             while (first != 0) {
00117                 first->setSpeed(speed, currentTime);
00118                 first = first->getNextSegment();
00119             }
00120             continue;
00121         }
00122 #endif
00123         (*i)->setMaxSpeed(speed);
00124     }
00125     if (!move2next) {
00126         // changed from the gui
00127         return 0;
00128     }
00129     if (myCurrentEntry != myLoadedSpeeds.end()) {
00130         ++myCurrentEntry;
00131     }
00132     if (myCurrentEntry != myLoadedSpeeds.end()) {
00133         return ((*myCurrentEntry).first) - ((*(myCurrentEntry - 1)).first);
00134     } else {
00135         return 0;
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 void
00141 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::myStartElement(int element,
00142                                    const SUMOSAXAttributes& attrs) {
00143     // check whether the correct tag is read
00144     if (element != SUMO_TAG_STEP) {
00145         return;
00146     }
00147     // extract the values
00148     bool ok = true;
00149     SUMOTime next = attrs.getSUMOTimeReporting(SUMO_ATTR_TIME, getID().c_str(), ok);
00150     SUMOReal speed = attrs.getOptSUMORealReporting(SUMO_ATTR_SPEED, getID().c_str(), ok, -1);
00151     // check the values
00152     if (next < 0) {
00153         WRITE_ERROR("Wrong time in vss '" + getID() + "'.");
00154         return;
00155     }
00156     if (speed < 0) {
00157         WRITE_ERROR("Wrong speed in vss '" + getID() + "'.");
00158         return;
00159     }
00160     // set the values for the next step if they are valid
00161     if (myLoadedSpeeds.size() != 0 && myLoadedSpeeds.back().first == next) {
00162         WRITE_WARNING("Time " + time2string(next) + " was set twice for vss '" + getID() + "'; replacing first entry.");
00163         myLoadedSpeeds.back().second = speed;
00164     } else {
00165         myLoadedSpeeds.push_back(std::make_pair(next, speed));
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 void
00171 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::myEndElement(int element) {
00172     if (element == SUMO_TAG_VSS && !myDidInit) {
00173         init();
00174     }
00175 }

00177 
00178 SUMOReal
00179 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::getDefaultSpeed() const {
00180     return myDefaultSpeed;
00181 }
00182 
00183 
00184 void
00185 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::setOverriding(bool val) {
00186     myAmOverriding = val;
00187     processCommand(false, MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep());
00188 }
00189 
00190 
00191 void
00192 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::setOverridingValue(SUMOReal val) {
00193     mySpeedOverrideValue = val;
00194     processCommand(false, MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep());
00195 }
00196 
00197 
00198 SUMOReal
00199 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::getLoadedSpeed() {
00200     if (myCurrentEntry != myLoadedSpeeds.begin()) {
00201         return (*(myCurrentEntry - 1)).second;
00202     } else {
00203         return (*myCurrentEntry).second;
00204     }
00205 }
00206 
00207 
00208 SUMOReal
00209 MSLaneSpeedTrigger::getCurrentSpeed() const {
00210     if (myAmOverriding) {
00211         return mySpeedOverrideValue;
00212     } else {
00213         // ok, maybe the first shall not yet be the valid one
00214         if (myCurrentEntry == myLoadedSpeeds.begin() && (*myCurrentEntry).first > MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep()) {
00215             return myDefaultSpeed;
00216         }
00217         // try the loaded
00218         if (myCurrentEntry != myLoadedSpeeds.end() && (*myCurrentEntry).first <= MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep()) {
00219             return (*myCurrentEntry).second;
00220         } else {
00221             return (*(myCurrentEntry - 1)).second;
00222         }
00223     }
00224 }
